name: Speed Kills (itch) (Vlatko Chankulovski)
description:
GAME JAM theme : Delay the Inevitable !

* What is inevitable in this game ?

- If you are rushing to reach somewhere and not being aware of the environment and the others, it's inevitable that sooner or later SOMETHING BAD will happen - SPEED KILLS ! 

Ignore the rushing, try to concentrate more on what time you have, and USE IT WISELY because IT'S LIMITED !

Gameplay :

This is a short but intense game, where the Player needs to reach the end of the Level ( reach the Lighthouse ), by crossing the streets carefully . 

There are different street difficulty to cross, so the Player needs to be more and more careful all the way long .

Also, the Player needs to reach the Lighthouse in 3 minutes time, so be quick and steady with the controls ! :D

This game is Single Player, playable on Windows 10 .

DISCLAIMER :

The Game file is scanned from viruses and threats with AVIRA ANTIVIRUS PRO prior uploading this file ,  NO DETECTION has been found !

The creator of this game has no responsibility if any threats or viruses occurs !
